snippet: Mr. Rich, who won Emmys for his work on “All in the Family” and “The Dick Van Dyke Show,” broke interracial boundaries with a simple kiss.
abstract: John Rich, Emmy-winning television director, dies at age 86.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Rich, who won Emmys for his work on “All in the Family” and “The Dick Van Dyke Show,” broke interracial boundaries with a simple kiss.

headline.seo: John Rich, Director of ‘All in the Family,’ Dies at 86
headline.main: John Rich Dies at 86; Challenged Taboos With an Interracial TV Kiss
headline.print_headline: John Rich, 86, Emmy Winner For ‘All in the Family’ Series
